propositions.text: A murder occurred in Zhongshan Park.
The victim was shot with arrows.
The victim was identified as Luo Zhengping.
Moran discovers a joint tombstone with her ex-husband, Liang Yongsheng.
The joint tombstone was a result of her participation in the 'True Love Club'.
The 'True Love Club' required participants to purchase a joint tombstone as a symbol of eternal love.
Gu Tian, a convicted murderer, leaves a substantial inheritance to Gao Jing.
The inheritance is actually from Gu Tian's brother, Gu Bing.
Gu Tian requests Gao Jing to investigate a past case as a condition for receiving the inheritance.
The case Gu Tian wants investigated involves a man poisoned by a rare plant called 'Dan Guo'.
The poisoned man was a supposed admirer of Gu Tian's work in toxicology.
The 'Dan Guo' plant's poison is unstable and only temporarily affects the immune system unless mixed with alcohol, which can be fatal.
Gao Jing refuses to take the case.
Gao Jing cites his lack of time and his position as a public official.
Liang Yongsheng proposes that Moran take on the case instead.
Moran is implied to be interested due to a past friendship with Gao Jing.
Gao Jing and Moran's friendship is strained due to Moran's past relationship with Liang Yongsheng and Gao Jing's sister, Gao Jie.
Moran accepted expensive gifts from Liang Yongsheng after her divorce, leading to a confrontation with Gao Jing.
The confrontation resulted in a complete break in their friendship.
Moran attempts to contact her old friend Fang Kailing for information about the 'True Love Club'.
Fang Kailing was the one who introduced Moran to the club.
Moran agrees to meet Fang Kailing at a piano restaurant called 'Chopin's Love'.
The meeting is scheduled for 8 PM to see a specific pianist.
The 'True Love Club' involved a deposit, a joint tombstone, and a 'life and death contract'.
The 'life and death contract' was a form of curse against betrayal of feelings.
Moran regrets signing the 'life and death contract' and feels deceived by the club's organizers.
The novel explores themes of betrayal, revenge, and the consequences of past actions.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured as a narrative novel with multiple interwoven plotlines. It begins with a violent crime, introduces a character's personal dilemma related to a past club, then shifts to a complex investigation proposal linked to a criminal inheritance. The narrative then delves into the personal histories and fractured relationships of the main characters, ultimately connecting back to the initial mysteries and the 'True Love Club'.
